<h3 id="X11036">X(11036)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: INCIRCLE-CIRCLES AND CONWAY</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^4-4*(b+c)*a^3-2*(b^2+4*b*c+c^2)*a^2+4*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a+(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :
<br>
<b>X(11036) = (4*R+2*r)*X(1)+(4*R+r)*X(7) = 3*(4*R+r)*X(2)-4*R*X(72) = r*(3*R+2*r)*X(21)+2*(4*R^2-r^2)*X(999)</b>
<p>X(11036) lies on these lines:{1,7}, {2,72}, {4,6147}, {8,4208}, {21,999}, {40,10578}, {46,5281}, {57,3523}, {63,3333}, {65,3475}, {78,9776}, {84,5558}, {144,405}, {145,377}, {200,11024}, {226,938}, {329,5129}, {346,3970}, {354,1858}, {388,6839}, {452,5905}, {495,3617}, {496,10883}, {497,3649}, {527,5436}, {553,3601}, {631,5708}, {912,6846}, {946,9799}, {950,3543}, {954,6986}, {1004,3871}, {1012,7373}, {1058,10431}, {1104,4644}, {1119,7513}, {1125,5273}, {1210,5056}, {1259,5253}, {1482,6916}, {1699,6744}, {1870,4198}, {2094,4652}, {2095,6988}, {3085,5902}, {3086,5443}, {3146,3488}, {3189,5880}, {3243,6764}, {3295,7411}, {3338,5265}, {3486,10404}, {3832,5714}, {3839,9612}, {3976,11031}, {3982,9579}, {4454,7283}, {4860,7288}, {5083,9964}, {5218,5221}, {5219,5704}, {5234,5850}, {5244,5712}, {5261,6993}, {5262,5813}, {5290,6738}, {5328,9843}, {5435,10303}, {5658,5806}, {5686,5904}, {5761,6926}, {6886,8232}, {8000,9804}, {9848,10391}, {10390,10429}, {10861,11035}</p>
<p>
X(11036) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,7,20), (1,1044,2293), (1,3671,962), (1,4292,4313), (1,4295,390), (1,4298,5731), (1,4312,4314), (1,4355,4297), (1,10624,8236), (7,4313,4292), (8,5249,4208), (57,5703,3523), (226,938,3091), (942,3487,2), (962,10884,20), (1210,5226,5056), (3622,9965,21), (4292,4313,20), (5219,5704,7486), (5708,5719,631), (5714,5722,3832)<br>
